outcome: Events unravel as the BCI starts restoring vanished low-score individuals with altered high-compliance profiles. The public grows uneasy as 'ghosts' return changed, raising questions about identity and the system's unseen power. Council factions remain silent but jittery.

events.description: Several residents known for past low BCI scores reappear in public life with perfect scores, new privileges, and little recollection of their absence. Neighbors whisper about their abrupt personality changes.
Council investigation quietly confirms a surge in reassigned digital identities. Directorate members demand answers. No official explanation is provided.
Rumors spread online that the BCI can 'rewrite' people. Families report loved ones returning with forgotten relationships, new jobs, and rewritten personal histories.
An anonymous campaign encourages citizens to document inconsistencies in returned individuals, fueling unease and deep distrust of the BCI's power.
